comments.author: BIG SQUEEZER
comments.comment:
This was my account I made while trying to make an account that i could test certain builds on without playing with higher ELO players. I made this account on September 9th and I played it a little bit. I have tried logging in recently and it said I was banned. Checked the match history on the account and it looks like it was accessed by someone else. I was really hoping there would be a way to get my account back? I am saying that this was not my doings and this account was seized by someone else.

<---> Ticket Summary <--->
Account signup email: imzessed@gmail.com
Do you have access to your signup email?: yes
Username: zestyhummus
Summoner Name: run it m1d
Region: north_america
Do you remember the account signup info?: yes
Account creation date: Septermber 9th
Date of Birth on the account (if you added it): 05/12/1997
Location where account was registered (city and country): Merrick, New York
Please explain how you first gained access to this account: I made this account with my bare hands and keyboard.
Other people (friends/family members) who have ever had access to the account: No one has ever had access.
Do you remember the store information?: no
What was your first ever RP purchase? (Include date and item): 
What did you use your refund tokens on?: 
Do you remember the first 5 champions you have purchased?: 
First 5 champions you ever purchased:: 
First 3150 IP champion purchased: 
First 4800 IP champion purchased: 
First 6300 IP champion purchased: 
Did you receive or give gifts on this account?: 
Gifts received: 
Gifts given: 
Help Center Stats:

comments.author: Agent
comments.comment:
Summoner,

We have a Player Behavior team in place dedicated to working with these requests, so I need to transfer your ticket. A Player Behavior Specialist will be contacting you as soon as they can.

Please keep in mind that we respond to tickets in the order we receive them, so ‘bumping’ your ticket by sending us additional messages will send it to the back of our queue. This might inadvertently delay our response :(

Thank you for your patience!

Isellyn

Riot Games Billing and Account Support

comments.author: Agent
comments.comment:
Hello Zessed,

My name is Hana from the Player Behavior team and I'm here to provide you with some context regarding your exploit ban.

I have reviewed your account to double check all the facts and we do have a lot of solid data against your account. Unfortunately, I cannot disclose any details regarding our investigation as we want to keep the methods that we use a secret from any malicious intent of gaming the system. There are no signs of unauthorized access to the account that correlate with the use of exploits. However, if you share your account with anyone else, that would be a violation of our Terms of Use and could attribute to the ban also.

I know it's disappointing to hear but we take this kind of violation very seriously and will not be able to modify this ban. Feel free to contact me if you have any concerns that I can answer.

Hana
Riot Player Support
Player Behavior Specialist
Support Main

comments.author: BIG SQUEEZER
comments.comment: Thank you very much, Hana! It's ok I can understand your policy about that stuff.  Thank you for your effeciency as well! Have a good day!
